column4: Quick quesiton, do you have your BIOS set to BOOT USB devices First ?
as that erros means, it's not seeing a valid Boot-Device.
yes, ummm.. when it's booting, on the bios boot screen, can you hit the escape key or F12 maybe and select a boot-device ?
The boot-manager is "after" install, LILO, Grub etc. this is a problem before that.
also, if the CD-ISO is corrupt, yo can get this error. Did you MD5 the ISO and burn it slow with your writer ?
the ISO from a flash Drive works ok ?
Ok, that sounds like a CD-Rom Drive or BIOS setting problem then. What Motherboard & CD-Rom drive you using ?
its a laptop
ok, We still can't rule-out that the ISO you burnt to the CD isn't bad. Sounds like the ISO itself is valid, as the flash drive boots it ok. What speed did you burn the ISO to CD at ?
just for info, I burn all ISO at the Slowest possible speed, usually 2x for DVD and 4x for CD, just to ensure the writer doesn't cause trouble.s
no burn on cd. Want extract to a external usb hd, boot and install to internal hd.
Oh, Ok, I mis-understood. when you say "extract" you mean copy the ISO to the USB drive ?
exactly
Ok, then you want to Boot that ISO from the USB Disk Drive yes ?
yes

that's essentially a Dual Boot System. You've god a couple options, Create a Dual Boot-System and like yoy said, you'l need a boot-manager installed on your Hard-Drive, or, disable the hard Drive in the BIOS, and do a Native Install to the USB drive itself.
thanks, let me try
no advance bro :(
i try boot-menage but doesnt make any diference
I would do, based on out previos conversation: disable the Internal HD, then install to the USB Drive. If that works, then do a Dual-Boot install, having Grub be your boot-manager.
already do that,..same error
you need to verify that the external USB drive is capable of Booting, until you sort that out, ya can't go any further.
Something, and Im not sure what, probably BIOS related, is preventing that Drive from being able to be a Boot-Drive Device.
yea maybe thats it. Im gona leave and buy a flash drive. Nothin more to do :S. Many thanks for the help
